original_text: “But while they were on their way to buy the oil, the bridegroom arrived. The virgins who were ready went in with him to the wedding banquet. And the door was shut.
korean_text: 그들이 사러 간 사이에 신랑이 오므로 준비하였던 자들은 함께 혼인 잔치에 들어가고 문은 닫힌지라

sentences.original_text: But while they were on their way to buy the oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들이 기름을 사러 가는 동안에

sentences.original_text: went in with him to the wedding banquet
